item.description:
NHREIA Fundraising Auction for Building on Hope

 

50% of the proceeds go to Building on Hope

  You’ll have the opportunity to donate to Building on Hope,

a volunteer organization committed to working in partnership with builders, architects and designers to provide physical improvements to facilities that support a non-profit service group's mission. www.buildingonhope.com

 

If you donate to Building on Hope, you’ll get free real estate investing courses/bootcamps, tickets to local attractions & more!

 

  Real Estate Items Include:

Alan Cowgill

2 tickets—Financial Freedom Boot Camp: Office Management – Alan Cowgill will cover systems and check sheets you need to use in your daily real estate business and much more! ($2,995 value!)

2 tickets—Where To Get The Money Boot Camp : Alan Cowgill will cover 16 ways to find private lenders . He’ll even bring in his SEC attorney to make sure you are doing things correctly. ($4,995 value!)

 

Than Merrill

Marketing & Wholesaling course

  2 tickets to Wholesaling bootcamp Boston, 8/ 4-7/2011 ($2,000 value!)

 

Eddie Speed

Fortunes In Seller Financing course – The most complete guide to real estate notes on the market! ($1,200 value!)

2 tickets—3-day seminar Rich Rewards In Real Estate Notes -

An intense, three-day workshop that will teach you

the most advanced techniques, tools, and tips in

the industry for note brokers. ($4,000 value!)

 

Mr. Landlord — The Landlord Survival Guide ($199 value)

 

PostBankruptyReport.com —The Bankrupt Tenant Course ($395 value)

 

Wendy Patton —

Rent To Buy Course ($99 value)

Rent to Sell Course ($99 value)

Rent To Buy Book ($20 value)

Rent To Sell Book ($20 value)

2 tickets to Lease Option Bootcamp ($497 value)

2 tickets to Lease Option Bootcamp ($497 value)

Linda and Nyrick Huuskonen -  2 tickets to any upcoming Powerhouse Wealth Strategies Weekend Workshop ($595 value each!)

Trump Nation - The Art Of Being The Donald by Timothy L. O'Brien -  3 CD Audio Book - ($24.98 value)   Get Paid for Who You Are - 5 Steps to Financial Freedom, Time Freedom, Location Freedom, and Inner Freedom by David Wood -  ($15.95 value)   Success for Teens - Real Teens Talk About Using The Slight Edge by the Editors of the Success Foundation ($100 value)   CashFlow For Kids - What the rich teach their kids about money ($59.99 value)   Locke In Your Success - 4 hours of Real Estate Investment Coaching ($400 value!)  

One Day Home Staging: 4 hours of interior design services (commercial or residential) from Judy Carlough (a $300 value!)  www.onedayhomestaging.com

  Plus Great Local Deals!   

Vertical Dreams Indoor Rock Climbing - 2 Day passes with rental gear $40 Gift Certificate

Four VIP Admissions to York's Wild Kingdom - $85 value

The Common Man  $25 Gift Card

TBones/Cactus Jack's $25 Gift Card

The Yard $25 Gift Card

FunSpot Gift Card $50 Gift Card

Panera Bread $25 Gift Card

Ship to Shore Restaurant, Newfields, $50 Gift Card

Fisher Cats - Family Four Pack


Sports Items

Dwight Evans autographed red sox hat-MLB/Fleet Authenicated, Approximate Value: $80

Fred Lynn autographed baseball-Tristar Authenicated, Approximate Value: $75

Dennis Eckersley autographed baseball-autograph obtained in person, Approximate Value: $100

Patriots autographed mini-helmet (4 Patriots autographs), Approximate Value: $100

Patriots Super Bowls 36 Tedy Bruschi autographed 8 X 10 picture, Sports Images Authenicated, Approximate Value: $300

Autographed 8 X 10 of Ted Williams giving battings instructions, Value: Priceless

 

Thank you to David G. and Jo Ann Hampson for the Sports Items Donations!  

Thanks to local auctioneer, Bert Cox, who has donated his time to facilitate the auction!

 

NHREIA Monthly Meeting
6:30 PM, Wednesday, July 13, 2011
Best Western Executive Court
13500 South Willow Street
Manchester, NH
FREE for members; only $20 for not-yet members  (not-yet-members who bring a non-perishable item for The Friendly Kitchen get in free!)
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
